textBeforeTable: Playlist Tracks:  To add the CD's "Love So Good 2" and "Black Coffee" by Pippi Ardennia visit www.amazon.com or www.pippiardennia.com...Also to listen to more of Pippi visit YouTube... Melinda J sat in today for Dee Henry Williams (The Grand Deeva) delivering the Sassy but Classy Ladies, Jazz, Blues, R & B, Gospel/Inspiration by LOCAL Talents, a SPECIAL Tribute to loved ones who have passed on to include Marguerite Buzicky...Thank you for listening and calling...   DJ Hooker Dee Henry Williams DJs:  January 11, 2014 A Great Blend Of Watercolors Program:    1/11/2014 A Great Blend Of Watercolors
